remarks: A neighborhood of a cluster point of a function contains a function value from every tail.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 27-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
statement: fcfneii $p |- ( ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ L e. ( Fil ` Y ) /\ F : Y --> X ) /\ ( A e. ( ( J fClusf L ) ` F ) /\ N e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` { A } ) /\ S e. L ) ) -> ( N i^i ( F " S ) ) =/= (/) ) $.
